languages.text: This knuckle guard grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. It also grants any equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This knuckle guard grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} tests. It also grants the equipped melee weapons +5% armour penetration and +2 damage.

languages.text: Дает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}. Также усиливает используемое {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашное{/g} оружие, увеличивая его {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g} на 5% и наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} — на 2.

traits.locale_text: Дает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}. Также усиливает используемое рукопашное оружие, увеличивая его {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g} на 5% и наносимый урон — на 2.

languages.text: ナックルガードは使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}に+5の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える。さらに装備された{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器に+5%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}と+2の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: This knuckle guard grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. It also grants any equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 自身の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}に+5の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を付与。さらに、装備した近接武器の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通力{/g}+5%／与えるダメージ+2

languages.text: Este protector de nudillos proporciona al portador una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}. También otorga a las armas {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} equipadas +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} y +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: This knuckle guard grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. It also grants any equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Este protector de nudillos proporciona al portador una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}. También otorga a las armas cuerpo a cuerpo equipadas +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} y +2 de daño.

languages.text: Dieser Knöchelschutz gewährt dem Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}. Er gewährt außerdem allen ausgerüsteten {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffen{/g} +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: This knuckle guard grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. It also grants any equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Knöchelschutz gewährt dem Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}. Er gewährt außerdem jeglichen ausgerüsteten Nahkampfwaffen +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und +2 Schaden.

languages.text: Ces protège-mains confèrent à l'utilisateur un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} de +5. Ils confèrent également aux armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} dont il est équipé +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et +2 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: This knuckle guard grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. It also grants any equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ce protège-joint confère à son utilisateur un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g} de +5. Il confère également aux armes de mêlée dont il est équipé +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et +2 points de dégâts.
